original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ cittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nocitto dhammo
analyzed: ▁an idassanaappaṭigh aṃ ▁cittaṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁na an idassanaappaṭigh o ▁no citt o ▁dhammo

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ cittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁an idassanaappaṭigh aṃ ▁cittaṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁nasanidassanas a ppaṭi gh o

original: nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ cittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
nasanidassanasappaṭigho nocitto ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nocitto ca dhammā uppajjanti

original: hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ nocittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
